Title: Jamie's POV
Plot:
This episode is all from the point of view of Jamie, a typical teenager whose main thoughts are girls and parties. Jaime's latest crush is Nicki, who's just split up with her latest boyfriend.
Sooz is the dark and struggling artist of the group with her many piercings and tattoos and an attitude that scares most guys away.
Rob is a young man who works at a coffee bar and is in a relationship with Sasha, Nicki's best friend.
Finally there's Alex who who is best mates with Jaimie and a pal to Sooz
